update.available: Available, an update is. Click to download.
update.downloaded: Ready to install, update is, when you quit.

drop_cover.text: Drop a mod here, you should, to install

onboarding.title: Welcome, you are
onboarding.description_download: Find a copy of DDLC, we must.
onboarding.button_download: Official download page, visit you should
onboarding.s1_desc: Download Doki Doki Literature Club from the official website (ddlc.moe), you must. Click the button below.
onboarding.s2_desc: Select the file using the button below, after download you have.
onboarding.description_location: Stored at {0}, your games will be.

login_input.message: Enter your email address, you must
login_input.details: Sent to this address, a login link will be.

change_username_input.message: Enter your new username, you must
change_username_input.details: Unique, usernames do not have to be.

uninstall_confirmation.details: Your save data for {0} will be deleted. Need a copy of the mod to install again, you will.

rename_input.details: Enter the new name for {0}, you should.

mod_delete_confirmation.message: Delete the mod, are you sure?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: Download another copy to install again, you must.

save_delete_confirmation.message: Delete your save data, are you sure?
save_delete_confirmation.details: Start {0} again from scratch, you will.

install.description_achievements: Keep playing to unlock more achievements, you must.
install.description_achievements_complete: Unlocked all achievements, you have. Congratulations!
install.description_screenshots: Press S while playing to take a screenshot.
install.description_sdk: Special features with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK, this mod supports.

install_creation.title: Install DDLC
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse for a mod.
install_creation.description_vanilla: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. Separate from any other copy of the game, the save data will be.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. Shared with other copies of the game (like Steam), the save data will be.
install_creation.description_modded: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. Separate from any other copy of the game, the save data will be.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. Shared with other copies of the game (like Steam), the save data will be.
install_creation.status_exists: That folder already exists. Pick another folder name, you must.

tab_store_placeholder.title: The store is coming soon, patience you must have.
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: The Sayonika mod database will provide a central place to share, download and review DDLC mods. When Sayonika is public, browse mods here you will.
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: While you wait, download some recommended mods, you should.
tab_store_placeholder.error: Failed to load the list of mods. Offline, are you?

tab_store.title: Sayonika Store
tab_store.subtitle: Discover and download DDLC mods
tab_store.offline_message: Currently offline, you are. Check your internet connection and try again.
tab_store.maintenance_banner: Authentication services are temporarily unavailable due to maintenance. Browse mods you can, but login or register, you cannot.
tab_store.no_mods_message: Try adjusting your search or filters

login.title: Login to Sayonika
login.username_help: Use either your username or email address to log in, you can
login.register_link: Don't have an account? Register here

translation.enabled: Translation enabled. Content will be translated when available.

section_backgrounds.title: Background
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customize your copy of Doki Doki Mod Manager with one of these backgrounds.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds courtesy of Team Salvato.

section_storage.title: Storage Location
section_storage.subtitle: Change where your game data is stored.
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If you choose to change your install location, all your mods, installations and save data will be moved. This may take several minutes, and cannot be interrupted.

section_updates.title: Updates
section_updates.subtitle: Get the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_sdk.title: Achievements & SDK
section_sdk.subtitle: Change the way achievements are handled.
section_sdk.checkbox_specified: When the mod specifies it supports them

section_testing.title: SDK Debug
section_testing.subtitle: Enable debug logging to test your mods with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK.

section_language.title: Language
section_language.subtitle: Change the language of Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_language.description_restart: Language changes will take effect after restarting the application.
section_language.notification_changed: Language changed to {0}. Please restart the application to see the changes.

tab_about.title: About, learn
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community project to help you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work and not by Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as Team Salvato's IP rules say.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager is not responsible for any damage to your files or device. Safe to play, make sure mods are.
tab_about.description_support: Doki Doki Mod Manager is always free. If you like it, support me!

jumplist.task_launch: Open Doki Doki Mod Manager and launch {0}, you will.

running_cover.description_running: Close the game to make changes to your mods, you must.
running_cover.install_missing: The install could not be found.
running_cover.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete or corrupt.
running_cover.install_crashed: The game failed to launch or crashed.

game_browse_dialog.title: Locate a copy of DDLC's zip file

shortcut_dialog.title: Choose where to place your shortcut

exception.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed
exception.body: The problem has been reported. Please restart and try again.

move_install.title: Failed to move install folder
move_install.body: Check that you have permission and enough space to move to this folder.

shortcut.title: Failed to create shortcut
shortcut.body: Check that you have permission to create files in this folder.

install.title: Failed to install game
install.body: Check that you have permission and enough space to install.

rename.title: Failed to rename
rename.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

uninstall.title: Failed to uninstall
uninstall.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

save_delete.title: Failed to delete save data
save_delete.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

mod_delete.title: Failed to delete the mod
mod_delete.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

renderer_freeze.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager stopped responding
renderer_freeze.body: If this issue lasts for a long time, close the app and start again.

executable_permission.title: Failed to make game executable
executable_permission.body: Could not make DDLC.sh executable on Linux. The game may not launch properly.
